attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The price of petrol and diesel is excessive, it is hurting British business and the ordinary motorist.  The tax and duty system on fuel should be used to stabilise the price of petrol and diesel at below £1 per litre.  This would help the haulage industry and help the ordinary motorist at a time when the oil price has hit a record high.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
